metadata.title: CVE-2016-5625 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.7.14 and earlier allows localusers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectorsrelated to Server: Packaging.

criterions.comment: mysql-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
